Bed Bath & Beyond CEO Mark Tritton on Thursday expressed disappointment over the retailer's supply-chain issues in its third quarter, while also suggesting there's a silver lining to be found.

articles.author: Anneken Tappe, CNN Business
articles.title: Omicron hasn't stopped the jobs recovery -- yet - CNN
articles.description: America closed out 2021 with strong jobs gains, economists predict. But just days into the new year, the Omicron variant is causing infections to soar and businesses to struggle. Will that derail the jobs recovery?
